title: Configure Claude Code
description: To use AI features, you need to configure a Claude Code provider and key.

provider.label: Select Provider
provider.anthropicDescription: Official Anthropic API providing Claude models
provider.zhipuDescription: Claude API compatible service provided by Zhipu AI
provider.aliyunDescription: Claude API compatible service from Aliyun DashScope platform

endpoint.label: Endpoint Address
endpoint.autoFilled: Endpoint is auto-filled based on selected provider
endpoint.customHint: Enter your custom Anthropic-compatible endpoint URL

modelMapping.label: Model Mappings
modelMapping.description: Configure the models to use for each Claude tier. Leave empty to use default.

validation.failed: API Key is invalid, please check and try again
validation.timeout: Validation timeout, please try again later
validation.networkError: Network connection failed, please check network and try again
validation.rateLimit: API requests are too frequent, please try again later
validation.invalidFormat: Invalid API Key format, should start with sk-ant-

cli.label: CLI Status
cli.versionTooOld: ⚠ Claude Code CLI version too old, update recommended

existingConfig.title: Existing Configuration Detected
existingConfig.description: We found an existing Claude configuration on your system.

skipped: AI features will be unavailable. You can configure later in settings.
testClaude.subtext: Open terminal and execute claude hi
